long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new and improved Modern Predictor Test and Odi pack includes Montecarlo simulations of more than ten thousand simulations to give you the right score each time and with the most accurate Confidence Intervals available at more than 90 percent making it the only predictor to do so .To be meant to be used for Tests and Odis and for T20 games.
